name: Blow-Carts
description:
Blow carts is a post-apocalyptic racing game where unlike most racing games of the same genre, your objective here is to avoid being killed by the stage itself as some portions of the stage will have environmental hazards which will kill you. The race itself is done against 2 other Bots making the game a race of 3 cars in total.

This game was made as a prototype for a project in University, Im planning on working on it more.
